example.eg: My ancestors were Normans who settled in England.
example.egtrans: 我的祖先是在英国定居的诺曼人。

example.eg: The ancestor of all domestic dogs was a prehistoric wolf.
example.egtrans: 所有家养狗的物种原型都是史前狼。

dsense.name: ancestor
dsense.guideword: figurative (idea, invention: earlier version) (比喻，主意、发明等的)

example.eg: The pocket watch used by Victorian gentlemen was the ancestor of the wristwatch.
example.egtrans: 维多利亚时期绅士们所使用的怀表就是现在手表的原型。
